pummel.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to hit someone or something many times quickly, especially using your fists (=closed hands)
pummel.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Diane leaned over and pummeled the pillows.
The platoon was pummeled by heavy machine-gun fire.
She flew at him, pummelling his chest with her fists.
The cook pummelled at the dough.
pummel.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to completely defeat someone at a sport
